meta.title: Product Details
meta.description: Donor Goat Serum: collected from healthy adult goats under strict herd monitoring, filtered for high quality and excellent lot-to-lot consistency.

product.name: Donor Goat Serum
product.intro: Front selects healthy adult goats from strictly monitored herds as donors. The serum is collected and thoroughly filtered to deliver a high-quality product with excellent lot-to-lot consistency.
